title: The Anatomy of a Great Learning Experience
subtitle: Explore how different components work together to create memorable learning

detail.purpose: A great learning experience combines multiple elements to help learners understand, retain, and apply new knowledge effectively.
detail.howItWorks: Each component serves a specific role - engagement captures attention, content delivers value, practice builds skills, and feedback closes the loop.
detail.keyInsight: The whole is greater than the sum of its parts. When all components work together, learning becomes transformative.

detail.purpose: Captures and maintains the learner's attention throughout the experience.
detail.howItWorks: Uses curiosity gaps, relevance to personal goals, and appropriate challenge levels to keep learners invested.
detail.keyInsight: Without engagement, even the best content goes unnoticed. It's the gateway to learning.

detail.purpose: Presents new information in a clear, structured, and memorable way.
detail.howItWorks: Breaks complex topics into digestible chunks, uses multiple modalities, and builds from known to unknown concepts.
detail.keyInsight: Good content doesn't just inform - it transforms how learners think about a topic.

detail.purpose: Provides opportunities to apply knowledge and build procedural skills.
detail.howItWorks: Offers varied exercises that gradually increase in complexity, with appropriate scaffolding and support.
detail.keyInsight: Learning is not a spectator sport. True understanding comes through doing.

detail.purpose: Provides learners with information about their performance to guide improvement.
detail.howItWorks: Delivers timely, specific, and actionable information that helps learners understand gaps and next steps.
detail.keyInsight: Feedback isn't about judgment - it's about creating a clear path forward.

completionMessage: You've explored all the components of a great learning experience. Notice how each part connects to and supports the others.
